basnahira, madhyama, sabaragamuwasaha dakunu palathwala witin wita wasi ho gigurum wasi athi wiya hakiyi.nagenahira saha uuwa palathwala saha mulathiw disthrikkaye sawas kalayedi ho rathri kalayedi wasi ho gigurum wasi athi  haki bawayi kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa kiya sitiye.me athara wayambaa palatheda  wasi wara kihipayak athi wiya hakiyi.basnahira saha sabaragamuwa palathwalath galla saha mathara disthrikkawalath atham sthanawalata mi.mi. 50 ta wadi tharamaka thada wasi da athiwime hakiyawa thibenawa.gigurum sahitha wasi samaga athiwiya haki thawakalika thada sulan walin saha akunu mangin sidu wana anathuru awama kara ganimata awashya piyawara ganna lesa kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa janathawagen illimak kara thibenawa.

samana prathicharayak shange bumuthurunu adawiyeda pala kalemi.ajith parakum ejapaye nayakayanta upades dimen apeksha karanne kumakda?shrilanipaya ha ejapaya yanuwen dhanapathi panthiye paksha dekak pawathwa ganime adahasa dhaneshwara kramaya awulak nathiwa pawathwa ganimayi.kramaya susara kota thibenne ek pakshayak atha aandu balaya radawima ha aneth pakshaya wipakshaye thabima matha,aandu balaye sitina pakshaya aprasadayata lakwana wita swayankriyawa aneth dhanapathi pakshaya balayata ena paridiya.rajapakshage pawulwadi rejimaya wisin ese susara kota thibu dhaneshwara kramaye deshapalanaya peramuna ekthara durakata awul kota thibe.(panthimaya awashyathawanta ihalin pawulmaya awashyatha thabima haraha)me nisa lankawe dhanapathi panthiye sampradayikawa balaya hebawu dakshinanshika kotas saha mahindage pawulwadi nawa prabhu kotas athara prathiwirodhayak hatagena atha.me prathiwirodhaya aadhipathyaya sambandhayen prabhu depirisak athara hatagena thibena aarowaki.me aarowedi wamanshikayan gatha yuthu sthawaraya kumakda?ek kandayamak palawa hara jayaganna andama gana anith kandayamata tiyushan laba dimada?ejapaya jayagaththath kirimata niyamitha dhaneshwara sanwardhana wada itha agana lesa me wanawitath uthuru nagenahira idam kunukolleta wikuna damamin,dhiwarayange jiwitha matha si plen bassamin siduwemin thibe.pidithayage parshawaye sita balanawita ejapaya nagittaya kiya athiwana yahapatha kumakda?
